parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_STOPPED: 0: The local audio is in the initial state. The SDK reports this state in the case of REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_LOCAL_MUTED, REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_REMOTE_MUTED or REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_REMOTE_OFFLINE.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_STARTING: 1: The first remote audio packet is received.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_DECODING: 2: The remote audio stream is decoded and plays normally. The SDK reports this state in the case of REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_NETWORK_RECOVERY, REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_LOCAL_UNMUTED or REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_REMOTE_UNMUTED.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_FROZEN: 3: The remote audio is frozen. The SDK reports this state in the case of REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_NETWORK_CONGESTION.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_FAILED: 4: The remote audio fails to start. The SDK reports this state in the case of REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_INTERNAL.
